sections.Title: Introduction
sections.Content: Hi there! I am Sem Pruijs and I love music, art, science and technology. I like making games, playing around with Arduino's and improving my software engineering skills. I am also interested in aerospace engineering and my dream is to go to mars.

sections.Title: Projects
sections.Content: You will be able to see all my projects here in the future. I am currently working on Flyght. Which is a local multiplayer fly fight game designed for tablets. It will be added someday. You can always visit my GitHub to see some of my projects if you cannot wait.

sections.Title: Games
sections.Content: If you want to play a game that I have made. Wosta is an iOS game that I have made in collaboration with my dad. OneHourGameJam is a game jam where you have to make a game in one hour. I participate in this game jam almost every week. So there is always something fresh to play on my account :) Parallel Worlds is a game that I have made in 7 days for the HighPixelGameJam on itch.io.

sections.Title: Contact
sections.Content: If you want to collaborate with me, a game jam for example. You can send an e-mail to sem@pruijs.nl
